pinyin: jīn gāng bù huài zhī shēn

examples.chinese: 希望能练就金刚不坏之身吧
examples.translation: Hope to train an invincible body

examples.chinese: 以前总觉得自己是金刚不坏之身,但是最近身体出问题了
examples.translation: Used to think I was invincible, but recently my body has problems

examples.chinese: 越长大越爱哭,以前金刚不坏之身分手都不留一滴眼泪
examples.translation: The older I get, the more I cry; used to be invincible, didn't shed a tear when breaking up
